alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:27PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas and northwestern Morehouse Parishes through 1000 PM CDT... At 926 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of West Crossett, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crossett around 940 PM CDT. Berlin around 955 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana.
